name: Laval Stennon
text:
1 Tuner + 1 or more non-Tuner FIRE monsters
When this card is Synchro Summoned: Send 1 card from your hand to the Graveyard. During either player's turn, when this card is targeted by a card effect: You can banish 1 "Laval" monster from your Graveyard; negate the activation, and if you do, destroy the targeting card.
